text: Nihsandeha allah bisbasidera prati anugraha karechilena yakhana tini tadera kache tadera madhya theke damra karalena ekajana rasula yini tamra nirdesabali tadera kache patha karena o tadera parisodhita karena o tadera kitaba o jnana-bijnana siksa dena; yadi'o era age nihsandeha tara chila spasta bhulera madhye.
